channel.title: [FIXED] Bluurs Client and Delta Source Glitch
channel.description:
I just started to use this Bluurs client I found with my old DeltaScape server source yet I ran into a few bugs, take a look:
1.) When it logs me in it shows that interface with the two heads with both Arrgh or whatever. How do I remove that? 2.) When I try to walk using the minimap, I click the minimap and it freezes the client. Where should I find the code to fix this? 3.) The common character glitch where the character, I don't know how to describe this but, sort or bobbles his head and depending on what I'm wearing does the bending over glitch thing.
Please help me fix these... If I find anymore I'll try to fix but these are the main ones that need fixing.
P.S. Is there a way to make the Bluurrs client load faster... it starts going slow at around "loading maps 83%."
_______________________________________________ I really [s]need[/s] want to fix this! Anyone know how I can do this?

item.title: [FIXED] Bluurs Client and Delta Source Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Judo_Nun Judo Nun
item.description:
@Judo_Nun wrote:

I realize that I am kicking up a post that’s been dead for a month, but how was this fixed as I have the exact problems listed and don’t want to lose the work i have done to the client.

Read full topic
item.source: [FIXED] Bluurs Client and Delta Source Glitch

item.title: [FIXED] Bluurs Client and Delta Source Glitch
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

FIXED!!! Everything works fine now! I found the error and it works! I’m so happy! Woot FTW!!!

Read full topic
item.source: [FIXED] Bluurs Client and Delta Source Glitch

item.title: [FIXED] Bluurs Client and Delta Source Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“ghostly150, post:6, topic:350272”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=446639.msg3278075#msg3278075 date=1279689770]
Two heads? your client is most likley uncompatible with your server.
[/quote]

I fixed that now…

I still need to fix the character wierd glitch thing and the map walking.[/quote]

If I we’re you I would save myself some trouble and download a new client.

Read full topic

item.title: [FIXED] Bluurs Client and Delta Source Glitch
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

[quote=“Bandos_Pk, post:2, topic:350272”]In player.java declare

public int hint = 0;
public int skulls = 0;

Then search for

playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

Then add above it

playerProps.writeByte(hint); playerProps.writeByte(skulls); [/quote]

if you do this make sure you undo this if you use another client. i did this and used another client and it did some wierd jumping emote and when i tried to walk it disconnected me

Read full topic
item.source: [FIXED] Bluurs Client and Delta Source Glitch

item.title: [FIXED] Bluurs Client and Delta Source Glitch
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

I did that part already, I found that code part from searching through threads with the Search button. Number one removed now. Just need to solve 2 and 3.

Read full topic
item.source: [FIXED] Bluurs Client and Delta Source Glitch

item.title: [FIXED] Bluurs Client and Delta Source Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Bandos_Pk Ivycial
item.description:
@Bandos_Pk wrote:

In player.java declare

public int hint = 0;
public int skulls = 0;

Then search for

playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

Then add above it

playerProps.writeByte(hint);
playerProps.writeByte(skulls);

Read full topic
item.source: [FIXED] Bluurs Client and Delta Source Glitch
